original: tad asyaiva prayojanaṃ vācyam iti pūrvapakṣadvitayaṃ paśyann āha -- tatreti nirdhā[4b]raṇe caitat /

original: etāsu ca anarthasambhāvanāsv ekasyām apy anarthasambhāvanāyāṃ na prekṣāvantaḥ pravartante /
analyzed: etāsu ca anartha sambhāvanāsu ekasyām api anartha sambhāvanāyām na prekṣāvantaḥ pravartante

original: atha yady evaṃvidhā pravṛttiḥ śāstrakṛtāṃ dṛśyate,
analyzed: atha yadi evaṃvidhā pravṛttiḥ śāstra kṛtām dṛśyate

original: tvayāpy asya kiṃ na sambhāvyata ity āha -- nāpi iti /
analyzed: tvayā api asya kim na sambhāvyate iti āha na api iti
apiḥ aprayojana apekṣayā samam pravṛtti darśanam samuccinoti

original: tad evotpaśāma iti sambhadhyamānam iha paśyāma ity asyārthe sambaddha(-bandha)vyam /
analyzed: tat eva utpaśāmaḥ iti sambhadhyamānam iha paśyāmaḥ iti asya arthe sambaddha bandhavyam

original: anenaitad āha -- tathāpi sambhāvayāmo yadi teṣām īdṛśī paśyāmo na tv evam iti /
analyzed: anena etat āha tathā api sambhāvayāmaḥ yadi teṣām īdṛśī paśyāmaḥ na tu evam iti

original: ato hetos teṣv abhidheyādiṣu yad vā teṣu śāstrakāreṣu vaktṛṣu satsu tadukteṣv abhidheyādiṣv iti prakaraṇāt saṃśayo 'rthonmukha iti draṣṭavyam
analyzed: atas hetoḥ teṣu abhidheya ādiṣu yat vā teṣu śāstra kāreṣu vaktṛṣu satsu tad ukteṣu abhidheya ādiṣu iti prakaraṇāt saṃśayaḥ rtha unmukhaḥ iti draṣṭavyam

original: nanu saty apy arthasaṃśaye 'rthatvābhāve pravṛttir nāsti /
analyzed: nanu sati api artha saṃśaye rtha tva abhāve pravṛttiḥ nā asti

original: tannimittā tu sā saṃśayamātrād api bhavati /

original: tanmātrañ ca sādhakabādhakavirahād apy arthe siddham /

original: tat kiṃ tadutpādārthena vākyenety āha -- anukteṣu -- iti /

tuḥ ukta avasthāyāḥ anukta avasthām bhedavatīm darśayati

original: nirgataṃ prayojanaṃ yasmān niṣkāntaṃ vā prayojanāt /

kākadantāḥ hi abhidheyāḥ

analyzed: sambhāvanā ca sarvā varṇitā nartha unmukhā pratipattiḥ yuktyā dvitīya ākāra anupraveśāt ca saṃśaya pada abhilāpyā pratyetavyā

original: tathāvidhā 'narthasambhāvanāyāś ca bījam idam asatyādivākye -- yady asya prayojanādikaṃ bhaved bahubhir anyair ivānenāpy ādāv uktaṃ bhavet

original: kāmam amūr anarthasambhāvanā bhavantu kā no hānir ity āha -- etāsv iti /

original: prayojanādyanabhidhāna iva yady abhidhāne 'pi bhavanti tās tadā kim abhidheyādibhir abhihitair apīty āha -- abhidheyādiṣu iti /

original: yasmād upadarśitāprāpakam eva mithyāñāṇam tasmād yat kiñcn mithyāñāṇaṃ tataḥ sarata eva nārthasiddhiḥ /

analyzed: yaḥ punar akasmāt vahneḥ upari maśaka varttim dhūmam avasāya vahnim a svasyati

original: so 'py anumākālāt pūrvaṃ yāvan maśakavarttyādibhyo vyāvṛttaṃ vahnikāryaṃ niyataṃ dhūmarūpaṃ nirūpya vivecitaṃ tadānīm anumānakāle nānusarati,
